TopicTitle: "No nearby controllable objects to switch focus to." Since when?

Articles.Content: I remembering being able to switch to any nearby parts in the past. Not just ones with probes on them. For instance in the breakup of a spacecraft during reentry. Is there a way to go back to this?
The '[' and ']' keys were modified approx. 1.10. By default, they now only switch between controlled vessels. Hold the Alt key while pressing those keys to switch to uncontrolled vessels and debris.

On 6/25/2021 at 9:30 PM, DeadJohn said:

The '[' and ']' keys were modified approx. 1.10. By default, they now only switch between controlled vessels. Hold the Alt key while pressing those keys to switch to uncontrolled vessels and debris.

Thank you!
